column4: Unique ID for Proteomics associated to this dataset.
Date or timeframe when the assay was performed
The specific method used to analyze the proteome. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.
The title of the kit/biologicals used.
A category header for the detailed target protein information.
If not using Uniprot as protein ontology, please add the name of database and protein identifier.
The status of the protein being studied.
A Yes/No field indicating if the sample was separated into different fractions before MS analysis to reduce its complexity.
The method used to break down the proteins into peptides.
The specific post-translational modifications being studied. If not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.
A list of method that was performed to ensure the quality of samples or/and data.
column5: Internal QCs and external QC samples.

column4: Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.
(For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.
Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
